'''''The Shimmering Voyage''''' is the Version 1.0 Commemorative [[soundtrack]] album.

It features a total of 68 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The album is divided by four discs: ''Fairytales of the Isles'', ''Blazing Stars'', ''Roar of the Formidable'', and ''A Stranger's Sojourn''.

The album was first announced on July 9, 2021, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.0]]. The tracklist was announced on July 16 and the album was later released on July 19.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/547909059558030469 {{zh|「《原神》1.0回顾主题OST即将上线 」}}]</ref><ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1416993704674570241 The Shimmering Voyage Announcement]</ref>
